properties.areaDesc: Inland Kenedy; Coastal Kenedy; Zapata; Brooks; Jim Hogg
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 10:54PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Areas of fog...some locally dense...will continue to develop
across the northern ranchlands late tonight into Tuesday morning.
Visibility will be reduced to 1 to 3 miles in general, with
locally dense fog reducing visibilities to a quarter of a mile at
times. The fog will begin to lift and burn off Tuesday morning as
daytime heating increases.

Motorists are advised to drive with caution tonight into Tuesday
morning as visibilities may change rapidly over short distances.
Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your
vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant
reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to
destinations.

NWSheadline: Areas of fog expected across northern portions of Deep South Texas late tonight into Tuesday morning
